column5: You should be retired by now! Happy birthday to ya!
Thats just proof your wise  Happy birthday !!!!!!!
WTG and many more to ya.......I started my 50th year last wednesday..........TC and tight lines.....Chuck......
Best Fishes to ya on yer B-day Dan'l!!!
Heres to many a more Danbo.   Chuck, I could of swore you were in your late 30,s.
Have a great one Danbo with the double celebration of Canada Day!!  Cheers, 1leg

That's young too. Dayum. This is getting depressing. Seems there's only one person on this board I can call an old fart, and he's mere months older. Mebbe this explains why all the young kids hold doors for me, call me sir and offer to carry stuff to the car. Man, I'm gonna stop drinking Ovaltine.  Oh well, Happy Birthday Dano.  JF
There is nothing wrong at all with Ovaltine, I grew up sorta in Peterborough for heavens' sakes.  Happy Birfday to Dano, hope you enjoyed all the tributes due to you.  Best Fishes as well.
Hope ya had a good one Dan!  Sinker
Well...I'm a few hours late...but Happy Birthday...it's mine too..or..was mine..

Congrats Danbo, here's to many more.  I am a few behind you, but a couple of months ago I was driving past our local 55Plus centre................and................it hit me..................I can be a member there very soon
